downloadTitle: Perfmon Data Collection Automation Using Logman
downloadDescription: The purpose of this document is to collect Performance Monitor Data from SQL Server Farm.

downloadFile.name: Perfmon Data Collection Automation Using Logman.zip

detailsSection:
The purpose of this document is to collect Performance Monitor Data from SQL Server Farm. We discover and Assess 100’s of SQL Server Instance, collecting Perfmon Data for baseline from this server’s is very manual process, customer and we get into many issues for this collection.
This tool uses logman.exe to create the command which will create, start, stop and delete the performance counter set on the remote SQL Server Machine.
detailsSection_file_name: Perfmon Data Collection Automation Using Logman.zip
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a zipped folder that contains Perfmon Data Collection Automation Using Logman tools and associated documentation.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Do the following:
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.
